briefTitle: Study of Ruxolitinib Cream in Adolescents With Atopic Dermatitis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, One-Year Safety Study of Ruxolitinib Cream in Adolescents (Ages â‰¥ 12 Years to < 18 Years) With Atopic Dermatitis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of ruxolitinib cream in adolescents with Atopic Dermatitis (AD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
